The rooms are not big but were clean and the beds were comfortable. We stayed in the 2 room king suite and it felt like a regular room. This is the kind of resort type hotel that has smaller sized rooms to accommodate more guest in my opinion. Room decor was more modern and seemed fresh. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the constructive feedback and are happy to hear that your stay was enjoyable overall.  We hope to see you again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: I would like more breakfast options like eggs and sausages, the other la quinta inns i have stayed at do offer these. Service was fast and employees were friendly. Maybe offer more then 1 shampoo and conditioner when a family of 4 is staying.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the wonderful feedback you’ve provided in your review.  Your comments will be shared with our entire team, as this will certainly boost morale.  We hope to continue providing you with the same level of exceptional service for years to come.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Short notice trip to Disney.  The staff was very friendly and helpful from parking to checking in.  The room was very quiet and comfortable and a decent walk distance to Disneyland and California Adventure gates.  Free breakfast was great
Manager Response: Dianna,   We sincerely appreciate the time you've taken to shed such a wonderful light on your experience with us.  We hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: We stayed at the LA Quinta during our 1st family vacation to Disneyland. The location is excellent! There is a shopping mall with great restaurants, shopping and bowling within walking distance from the property. There is a shuttle service to the Disney resort that stops right behind the hotel, tickets can conveniently be purchased at the front desk as well. The continental breakfast was also an excellent value with a lot of options  our children loved it! The staff was also very helpful friendly and professional. Great value for the price paid! I definitely recommend this property! My only suggestion is that they offer treats for pets.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay and for your kind words about our friendly and professional staff.  We are delighted that you enjoyed our location, our complimentary shuttle and breakfast, and found our hotel to be a good value.  We look forward to having you as a guest again soon.  Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: This was a comfortable place to stay. Because we were up for business we were not bothered by the crying or excited children. But I question if this place is good for a late morning sleep. Our parking was comped! Our cute little male housekeeper was extremely polite and helpful
Manager Response: Kat,   We sincerely appreciate the constructive feedback and are happy to hear that your stay was enjoyable overall.  We hope to see you again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: If you're looking for a great hotel that's within walking distance to the resort and Anaheim GardenWalk look no further!  CLean, great breakfast that's included, and good wifi!  Elevator makes it extremely easy to get to your room.  Great pool and spa that's covered and heated and although its technically outside its protected from the weather!
Manager Response: Jayson,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to having you back again.  Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: You can walk or take the shuttle and don't need a car in Anaheim. You can reach the park in less then 15 Minutes from the hotel to the main gate.  It is a good balance between comfort, cost and location to the main actractions
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that you had a great stay and look forward to having you back again.  Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: My Stay at La Quinta Inns and Suites in Anaheim California
Summary: The La quinta Hotel was very nice.  The only issue I had was the television programing. There was not a good selection of programs except all of the news channels. Normally there is a menu where you can select and pay for movies.  This was not available at this location.
Manager Response: Melvin,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites and hope to see you again!              Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Will stay at this hotel again
Summary: La Quinta Inn & Suites is a good option when you want to feel comfortable in your hotel but not pay too much. Rooms were clean and comfortable, service was good, and the location is great for walking to Disneyland. Breakfast was also included.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the great review.  We take pride in the features you mentioned.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel need some serious work, not that I think anyone there would care.  The first night we stayed in a room that was so warm we could not even sleep under the covers, meanwhile we set the air to 65, which is the lowest it will go, but it was not 65 it must have been at least 80. The next morning we let the front desk know and his first response was sorry we are sold out, but I can have the maintenance man come check the air.  Which he did and said there was no to little freon and it could not be fixed as it was a Sunday, which he relayed to the front desk.  My husband called down to the front desk and "all of a sudden" there was a room and they were not sold out. They did say they would take off the parking for the broken air and that in the morning we could get more of a
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are so sorry to hear about your negative experience at our hotel. Our guests’ expectations are very important to us and when we fall short; we take it very serious and make it a priority to correct the issues.  While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, we do extend it with all sincerity.  We appreciate your honest feedback and will be sharing your comments with our entire management team.  We do hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to provide you with a better guest experience.   Sincerely,  Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: La Quinta is indeed dog-friendly.  We traveled with our dog and had a hard time finding a hotel that accepted a large dog. Other hotels only allowed small dogs and charged $100-$150 non-refundable deposit.  La Quinta welcomed my dog at no additional cost. This really made it a great value hotel.  The room was clean and spacious.  All the hotel staff that we encountered were welcoming and helpful. I definitely recommend this hotel if you are traveling with your pet and location is good even if we you are not headed to Disneyland. We spent most of our time at the beach.
Manager Response: Karen,  Thank you for your positive comments. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your business and welcome you and your four-legged family members at La Quinta!  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: OK, but a little dated, noisy
Summary: Room backed up to parking garage where people and kids were noisy - even late at night.  Room comfortable, but Hotel could use a refresh.  Breakfast area too small for Disney crowds - especially on weekends (and our visit was not peak times).  Breakfast host struggled to keep food replenished and tables clean.  Too many guests for room size.  All hotel staff were friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Michael,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your recent stay.  While we thank you for your kind words about our staff, we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your experience. Please note that this information has been passed on to our management staff to ensure improvements are made. We very much appreciated your business and thank you for staying with us.                    Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Bathrooms in need of repair. The sheetrock was cracked . Had water damage. Mold in tile. Mildew in on walls. Parking was ok. Pool was fine. Breakfast had no pastries. Only had waffles and oatmeal hot.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review of our hotel.  You have noted some deficiencies during your stay and we will make sure that these items are looked after. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you and hope you will give us another opportunity to be of service.   Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a wonderful location.
Summary: Check in was fast, staff was friendly and helpful.  Room was large and clean, lots of room to stretch out. Bed was comfortable, room was quiet.  Breakfast room was large, clean and well stocked with good choices. The location was perfect for sightseeing and close to the Honda Center.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your positive comments. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope your next stay is just around the corner!  We look forward to being here for you on your next visit.   Respectfully,                                Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at La Quinta Inn and Suites. The staff were very friendly and always willing to helping with information or whatever my needs were. The rooms are simple, but comfortable. They have a decent continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Jordan,  Thank you for staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your comments and we wish to welcome you back to the hotel soon!          Sincerely, Diana – LQ Customer Care

Summary: We booked this hotel because we are Elite members with LaQuinta. Big Big Mistake. We arrived and I went to check in. When you check in they don't tell you about the hidden $12.00 parking fee plus the rate for room. There are no elevators to got to parking garage. Yet, they want to charge you for the inconvenience. We went to our room and one of the workers were standing outside our door. He told us it smelled like paint and we wouldn't be able to stay there. He went and got us keys for the 3rd floor. We got in and this room smelled like paint as well. There was no apology for any of this. They really don't care about Elite members when they come here. They are all about taking your money! This is a family hotel not far from Disneyland. This is not a hotel for business or
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are so sorry to hear of the negative aspects that you experienced during your stay.  Please reach out to our Customer Care team for further assistance at LQCustomerCare@LQReviews.com.  We look forward to hearing from you.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Good stay but room for improvement
Summary: Stayed here for 5 days. It is a 15 minute walk away from Disneyland. The room was a little run down, bathtub was peeling and constantly leaked. The pillows were lumpy but the beds were comfortable. The room size was good for a family of 4 and offered a fridge and microwave. The daily breakfast was decent, offering cereals, bread, fruit, muffins or bagels, yogurt, oatmeal, waffles, boiled eggs, juices and tea and coffee. The breakfast room was big with lots of tables to sit at and the staff ensure all the food was stocked at all times so they never ran out of anything. Overall we enjoyed our stay but next time we would consider staying a little closer to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your candid feedback. We are very sorry to hear that the hotel was not up to par in the areas mentioned.  Please note this information has been passed on to our management staff to ensure improvements are considered and made. We very much appreciated your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Nice hotel near Disneyland and shopping center. Hotel room was spacious and clean, ideal when traveling with kids or teenagers. Free breakfast needs more hot items but ideally what you would expect in a continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Jenny,  Thank you for the great review.  We take pride in the features you mentioned.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Do Not book your stay here
Summary: Hotel will not hold the type of room you reserve.  They just give you what they have when you arrive.  Their breakfast room is loses at 9:00 am on weekdays.  Thry should notice that there were many guest arriving close to 9 am and should consider extending the housr.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the great review.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: excellent option to stay in Anaheim
Summary: it has a very good location but you have to know that is too far to get to Disneyland walking and if you want to take the shuttle you have to pay and if you are with your family it would be almost the same as the parking in the theme parks.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the great review.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: We met up with other family members here for our week-long visit to Disneyland. We found the front desk staff to be friendly and informative. They allowed us to store our luggage behind the desk when we needed to switch rooms to accommodate more family who arrived, and they even delivered the bags to our new room while we were off playing.  We stayed in a large room that had three separate sleeping rooms, and two bathrooms. It was perfect for us! The pull-out sofa wasn't the most comfortable, but the kids didn't mind at all. We even made a small bed on the floor from the couch cushions and extra blankets for one of the kids. The other beds had perfectly firm mattresses and I had zero back pain, even after days of walking around Disneyland. (Feet pain is another story, haha.) We
Manager Response: Kelly,  Thank you very much for staying at the La Quinta Inn & Suites. We are happy to hear that your stay exceeded your expectations. We certainly hope to see you again in the very near future.  Sincerely, Diana – LQ Customer Care

Summary: We had a great experience staying at La Quinta in Anaheim. I was nervous about the cleanliness of the hotel, due to it being pet friendly. However, the lobby, our room, and the hotel in general were very clean and well-maintained. We loved that our room had a separate living area with a sofa bed and a sliding door that could act as another bedroom. We had a great experience, and my dog loved it too!
Manager Response: Stephanie, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your recent stay and for your comments about the cleanliness of our property.  We are delighted that you had a great experience and enjoyed our location and our pet friendly policy.  We look forward to having you as our guest again.    Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: Was in town for the NAMM show with several friends, found this to be a convenient location, with very warm and welcome staff.  The breakfast was rather limited but there was still something for everyone.
Manager Response: Scott, Thank you for choosing La Quinta Inns and Suites, and for taking the time to post a review of your recent stay.  We are delighted that you found our staff to be warm and welcoming and liked our convenient location.  We appreciate you sharing your guest experience with the TripAdvisor community as it helps other travelers decide which hotel is the right one for them.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Fresh and Modern - a Great Value!
Summary: My son have stayed here twice while visiting Disneyland. The rooms are clean, modern and comfortable, and the staff are very helpful and friendly. The hotel is a few city blocks from Disneyland, so if your legs can handle the extra walk after the 8-10 miles you will likely do at Disneyland, this is the place for you. The extras like free breakfast, pool/jacuzzi and reasonable parking rates all add to the value for the money you pay. We will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much! We are so happy to hear that you and your family were able to enjoy yourselves at our hotel! Thanks again for letting us know, and we look forward to having you back again!      Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: The service was excellent and breakfast was very good. Everything was clean and we definetely enjoyed our stay. On our next trip to Disneyland we will be staying again. Good room for the price. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Crystal,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback on our property. We appreciate your positive remarks regarding your stay. We work very hard to deliver a superior level of service and are glad your stay was comfortable. We look forward to seeing you again real soon!  Sincerely, Diana – LQ Customer Care

Summary: Very nicely decorated, comfortable beds, comfortable room. Not run down at all. Friendly staff all around and good breakfast.  Price very reasonable for the accommodations and service received. Will stay there from now on.
Manager Response: Martha,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are happy that we had the opportunity to serve you and we hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel is located just a few blocks from Disneyland. It was a nice walk in the morning, but seemed a little far after a long day at Disneyland. There are plenty of Ubers available, so that is an easy option if you are too tired to make the walk.The room was very nice, spacious and clean. The breakfast could be improved upon, but it is adequate enough for something light to start your day. This was our third time staying here and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your recent stay.  We are delighted that you had a good stay and enjoyed our spacious rooms and our location.  We look forward to having you as our guest again in the future.  Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: Suite rooms with a sliding door. Free breakfast is quite nice, plenty of options. If you want a suite room at a great price with tons of sleeping space, this is your best bet. Less than a mile from Disneyland entrance, so a very easy walk.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for the review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel is located a mile from Disney, close to Downtown Disney, and a block from the Toy story parking lot for Disney.  There is valet parking or self parking which is $12 a night. The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. The room we were in was on the 4th floor and had sliding doors to separate the king bed from the fold out couch/living room. We had a good night rest.  There was a nice breakfast room with basic breakfast selections (waffles, oatmeal, muffins, cereal). There is a ticket desk on sight to buy Disney tickets. We liked this location that was centrally located to everything and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to having you back again.  Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Room for all the family. Clean and Pretty Free breakfast. Beds are comfy, had a good night sleep.  Rooms have a microwave and mini fridge, and coffee maker. Safe Parking structure. Close to Disneyland and lots of great restaurants.
Manager Response: Jose,   Your review was so refreshing to read!  Your wonderful comments will be shared with our entire staff.  We look forward to providing you with the same level of top notch service for years to come!     Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Easy walk or shuttle ride to Disneyland. Friendly and helpful staff. The rooms are tired looking, and the pillows are lumpy. They have breakfast included, which saves money if you are going to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your positive comments. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope your next stay is just around the corner!  We look forward to being here for you on your next visit.   Respectfully,                                Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: The night staff on check in was very rude.  We had 2 days of issues with getting into our room.  Our room keys would not open the door, had to have maintenance come and let us in For  2 days of our stay, very inconvenient.
Manager Response: Debbie,   We appreciate you taking the time to inform us of your recent experience with our staff.  The lack of professionalism described is certainly not in line with our code of conduct.  Your review has been shared with management so that training opportunities are implemented immediately.  Our hope is that you will give us another chance in the future to better your opinion.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: We stayed here to visit Disneyland of course! I liked the location it is very convenient to jump on ART & ride the bus to the park. The hotel itself is older but has been updated.  We had a King Suite and our bed was very comfy, The sleeper sofa was in it's own and private room for our teenager. So that worked out well. The only complaint I have was every time my teen turned over the bed creaked. I felt bad for her having to sleep on it.  The breakfast is basic with waffles, cereal, hard boiled eggs, toast and hot cereal. The coffee was good.   There is a Neighborhood Walmart on Ball Road. We went there and got snacks and water. There are many choices close by for restaurants. The Chheesecake Factory is directly across the street.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We certainly appreciate the time you've taken to provide your feedback.  It sounds as though your experience was enjoyable overall. Your suggestions for a better stay have been shared with management.   We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: For the price it is great
Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland. Our room came with a wall to separate us from the kids at night. It was a little noisy and older but you can’t beat the price. If you are looking for a cheap room to sleep in with your children during visits to Disneyland this is what you want. If you want a super quiet room look for a different hotel.
Manager Response: Shirley,   We truly regret that our accommodations did not fully meet your expectations.  We sincerely apologize for the external noise during your stay.  Surely this was quite an inconvenience for you.  Your review will be shared with our management staff so that we can rectify these issues. We hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity in the near future.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: My family enjoyed the separate kids room. This is a great value for a family stay. Located close to Disneyland and walking distance to restaurants. The rooms were clean and had all necessary accommodations.
Manager Response: Dawn,   Thanks for brightening our day!  We appreciate the positive feedback and will share your review with our staff.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: We had a great stay. Our room was clean and updated. Issue with TV was handled promptly.  Breakfast was pretty good.  Staff were helpful and efficient. It was an easy walk to DLand which was the purpose of our trip. We had a good experience.
Manager Response: Kboyd462, Thank you for posting a review of your recent stay and for your kind words about our friendly staff.  We are glad that you felt our hotel was a good value and we look forward to having you as a guest again.  Sincerely,	 Bennie, Customer Care Agent LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Roaches climbing on the walls of the room!!
Summary: Stayed for one night and found roaches climbing on the walls next to the bed when I woke up. Went to the bathroom to find 2 roaches in the bathroom as well. Hotel is beyond noisy and service is mediocre.
Manager Response: Ryan, Thanks for taking the time to post your review and giving us the chance to respond.  We are extremely sorry that you had this kind of guest experience at our hotel.  Our property is inspected and treated for pests regularly by a professional outside company; however, it sounds like we need to have them come and re-inspect our property to ensure this problem is rectified.  Many times, it is through our guests’ comments that management learns about these issues and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We hope to have you as a guest again in the future for a better experience. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary Heading: Cheap, convenient and clean but an environmental horror story
Summary: The location is great, we had a two room suite that meant we could seperate off the children and relax. My only real issue is the explosion of polystyrene in the breakfast area. Its nasty and unrecyclable and they use ALOT of it. Please consider switching to paper at least if you must use single use items. The breakfast itself is pretty grim, very carb and sugar rich, no even moderately healthy options.
Manager Response: Megan,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your positive feedback on our property. We are always striving to improve our property and genuine feedback is the best way for us to do that. We hope that you will visit us again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Good Stay Overall, does need more parking, even though they have Valet parking which is nice and convienent. Rooms where nice and clean and up to date. The Breakfast area was nice as well. We overall enjoyed the stay
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your comments and we wish to welcome you back to the hotel soon!          Sincerely, Diana – LQ Customer Care

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at La Quinta and it has been fantastic. We would never stay anywhere else. Large rooms and friend staff. A place that welcomes dogs is a place worth staying at 👍
Manager Response: Alison,  Thank you for staying with us again. We appreciate your loyalty and your continued trust in our hotel and our staff. Rest assured that we will do everything it takes to make us deserving of your loyalty.    Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I was locked out of my room three times due to the key reader not working. When i went to the front desk the woman there told me it was because the key touched my cell phone and deactivated the key. Which ws not the case. I took the key she handed me straight to the room didnt go in my pocket. As i have my four year old with me. Snd surpridse! it didnt work i went through no joke 8 keys. I talked to this same woman that my husband would be joining me later that night. She said ok and her fellow coworker confirmed saying a key would be left for him. My husband arrived and she said this was her first time hearing about this and that the previous staff didnt leave a key. So i had to wake my 4 year old and go downstairs to get him.
Manager Response: Kristen,   We truly regret that our accommodations did not meet your expectations but mostly we regret that we were unable to resolve the issues to your satisfaction while staying with us.  Your review will be shared with our management staff.  We hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity in the near future.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Front desk and call center manager have the most disappointing service ever. Absolutely no compassion for customers, hotel floor had strong stinch of marijuana and large dog barked all night . Room was way to small for my family size I was told we would be moved but the front desk representative lied to me .
Manager Response: Amity,   Thank you for your review.  We would like to extend our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  The lack of professionalism and concern that you described is certainly not the standard code of conduct.  We will be forwarding your feedback to the hotel management team to be reviewed and addressed.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Arrived late valet parking required the attendant was smoking Marijuana. Did not want to give car keys to person under the influence of illegal drug but had no choice as self parking was not available.   Coffee maker was not working in the room
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear about your experience. If it would be possible to speak with you regarding your situation, that would be great. Our phone number is 714-635-5000

Summary Heading: Great Stay, Great Service, Friendly Staff
Summary: This is our "Go To" place to stay when visiting Disneyland and traveling with our pet.  Excellent, modern clean rooms to fit all needs.  Good security and valet parking late at night if needed.  A bright spot in the La Quinta brand.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are deeply elated that we have been your constant hotel of choice when you're in the area.  As always, don't hesitate to let us know if you're visiting again soon. Our staff is always ready to help you with anything. Thank you and take care.    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Breakfast does not have much variety.  Housekeeping took my pillow case and front desk was not helpful it trying to find it. It was never returned to me. Housekeeping also threw away packaging I wanted to keep because I possibly planned to return the product. Pool is super nasty and people smoking weed around it at night. I was pretty happy with the room set up, but that's about it.
Manager Response: Emily,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your recent stay. Please know that your feedback is extremely important for us to continue to improve our service. We strive to offer a smooth and comfortable stay for our guests and it seems we fell short during your stay.  We would like to extend our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. The hotel manager will be discussing your experience with the staff to ensure we are delivering the quality of service our guests deserve. Thank you very much for bringing your concerns to our attention.     Respectfully, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Stayed here to visit Disneyland for Christmas time. Check in was easy, fast, and felt welcoming which kept our spirits high. The hallways and overall hotel was clean, but entering the room was HOT. Our entire trip the air conditioning would not seem to work as we would set it as low as possible but it was always hot in our room. We stayed in a suite which was large for a room but I would say small for a suite. The layout was very weird as you enter in the door straight into the bathroom with the sink to your right and restroom to the left. Then the room with king bed and the tv but past it is the living room. The breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback.  We apologize for the issue regarding the A/C. Your comments will be shared with our maintenance staff so that we may improve our operation and prevent similar situations from occurring.  We hope you’ll once again choose us for your lodging needs.    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Pillows were very uncomfortable. They need to do better. Also, the tickets we bought at the front desk for Disney were the wrong ones so it required us to go to the ticket office and go through a lengthy return and replace process. The ticket office said the motels are always getting it wrong. They sold us “value day tickets on a day that was not a value day.
Manager Response: Matt,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.  The hotel management team will be advised of your review in an effort to improve our operations.  We appreciate your feedback and hope you will provide us another opportunity to serve you again in the future.                                                                                                                                                                                                 Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: We like the location because it was close enough to Disneyland where we took an Uber car to Disneyland to and from just for $10 for the whole family so that was a value. We like the hotel because it was a breakfast and it was nice and clean and only open till 9 little bit of a concern for the people that got up later but opened at 6 so that helped out a lot and parking was good just surprised that we had to pay for parking, but I guess that is LA.
Manager Response: Janet,  Thank you for staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your comments and we wish to welcome you back to the hotel soon!    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Paper thin walls. Kids running around at 5:30 in morning. Parents talking loudly in the halls. Front desk says no noise policy???? Sofa bed springs sticking in your back. Housekeeping was great. Breakfast bar had same items all three days. So disappointed left a day early.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are very sorry to hear of your negative experience while staying with us.  We appreciate the constructive critique, as we are continuously striving to improve our guest's experience.  It is only through your feedback that improvements are considered and made.  Our hope is that you will give us a chance to better serve you in the future.  We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: What a great place to stay with our 2 kids and dog! The spacious 2 room suite was the way to travel with a family of 4. The hotel was very clean, staff was accommodating, just enough offerings for a morning breakfast before a day in Disney and couldn't beat the great rate. We will definitley return to this property in the future!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much! We are so happy to hear that you and your family were able to enjoy yourselves at our hotel! Thanks again for letting us know, and we look forward to having you back again!      Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I had a nice stay at the La Quinta. Check in was a breeze and the gentleman that assisted me was super nice and friendly. The room is good sized and I like that the bedroom was separate from the living room area. A room like this would definitely be ideal for families traveling together. The walls are thin, I could hear a dog barking around 11PM but it didn't stop me from falling asleep. I was exhausted from being at Disney all day! I took a Lyft to the park, and should have taken a Lyft back to the hotel after because the walk back was a little longer than I anticipated. I went to a concert at the House of Blues which is conveniently located across the street. The Anaheim Gardenwalk looks like it would be a nice place to take a stroll and do some shopping. I would stay here
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Great stay ! 10 min walk from Disneyland
Summary: Excellent for the price! Its conveniently a 10 minuite walk from Disneyland. We stayed there for 2 nights, were given breakfast. Only complaint is that you had to buy your water which was $3+ per bottle. For the price we expected to have water bottles stocked in the mimi fridge. Other than that, no complaints what so ever. The room was big, the beds were comfortable and clean! Will be comming back and recommending to family and friends!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the fantastic review!  We appreciate you taking the time to convey your feedback.  Please come visit us again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Clean room, but the entire building creaked so much with every step anyone on the floor above took we were unable to sleep very well. There was also insufficient parking for all guests. The breakfast was decent, and the service was fine. Not a terrible place, but we probably won’t be staying here again with so many hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Tanya,   We are very sorry to hear of your recent experience with us.  This is certainly not the experience we hoped you would have.  Your comments regarding your noted inconveniences have been shared with our management team so that corrective measures are considered and made.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel is a sufficient place for a short stay plus the chain is extremely pet friendly. I would love to see the bathrooms renovated or refreshed and would love a firmer mattress if possible. We do love the location and hospitality but miss the La Quinta Rewards welcome we used to get.
Manager Response: Marie,  We appreciate hearing our guest’s feedback as it provides us with the opportunity to see where our guests feel we need to improve.  Your comments have been directed to our management team for review. We constantly strive to provide excellent service and satisfaction to all of our guests, and when a guest takes the time to write, we are especially grateful.  We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you during your stay. Thank you for your business and hope you continue to choose again us for your lodging needs.  Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: First and last time... really disappointed
Summary: Concrete-hard bed, lackluster customer service, disappointing breakfast that will not be replenished even if the "dining hour" is not complete, and paper thin walls made this a very disappointing stay.
Manager Response: Bethany,  Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay with us. Please accept our sincerest apologies for your unsatisfactory stay. While negative reviews are disappointing to our team, it provides us with an opportunity to improve. We take great pride in delivering a quality product and superior service and clearly failed to do so for you. The hotel management team will be advised of your review in an effort to improve our operations. We do hope you choose us for your future travels.               Respectfully, Diana – LQ Customer Care

Summary: I traveled on a emergency to Orange due that my daughter was in the Hospital, and did not know were I was going to stay nor the lenght of stay. I found La quinta through Expedia and booked for 1 night, then my stay had to be extended and did that on line. Being tired and stressed, needed to check in early to be able to rest and called the hotel, explained my situation, and I found a great understanding and help from thr staff. If you are looking for a great Hotel and friendly staff, this is the place. Thank you for all the service and assistance provided
Manager Response: Hector,  Your kind comments are very much appreciated. We constantly strive daily to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of and we're happy that we had the opportunity to serve you!  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Wonerdful stay! Excellent breakfast! Spotless!! A+++
Summary: We had a wonderful time at la Quinta!! It was amazing clean and very close to Disneyland!! Location was great! Breakfast was perfect and our room was very nice and very clean!! We are planning on coming back again next year!!
Manager Response: Bobby,   We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and look forward to your next visit!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Very nice rooms, clean and colorful, 2 T.V.s. Great bathroom. You are allowed to bring small dogs.  So was very happy with that also. They take real good care of your car.  Took the bus to Disney which really helped with tired feet.  Loved my stay,  Thanks for the great service.
Manager Response: Diana,   We appreciate the fantastic feedback and compliments you've given.  Our goal is to provide our guests with a superb experience.  We are pleased to hear that we accomplished that goal!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Recent Stay at Anaheim La Quinta
Summary: It is nice to be close to Disneyland and Restaurants. The whole facility needs to be upgraded. The carpets in the hallways were very dirty and the rooms didn't block noise in the hallways. The elevator seemed too small for a hotel of that size. The pool is very outdated.
Manager Response: Kerrie,   Thanks for taking the time to write your review, as we appreciate the feedback.  While our hotel is an older facility, it is still our responsibility and pleasure to present the most clean and comfortable rooms possible.  Your comments indicate that we still have further work to do.  Rest assured we will do everything we can to make the necessary improvements. We hope to see you again in the future.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: I enjoy staying at the LaQuinta in Anaheim.  The room is spacious, clean and they allow pets.  Having breakfast is a plus.  It is close to Disneyland where you can walk 10 minutes or ride the shuttle.  If you don't want to eat in the park there is Cheese Cake Factory across the street and other restaurants.
Manager Response: Shirley,   We appreciate the fantastic feedback and compliments you've given.  Our goal is to provide our guests with a superb experience.  We are pleased to hear that we accomplished that goal!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: No elevator in garage, dark, smells
Summary: This is not La Quinta standard. No elevator in parking garage. Be prepared to lug your heavy luggage up and down stairs. Hotel is very old, dark, low ceilings and smells. There is no insulation and I was up for several hours listening to people walking back and forth. Desk tried to charge me different rate that what was quoted. Also tacked on a surprise parking fee. Not acceptable La Quinta.
Manager Response: Eilene,   We are very sorry to hear of your recent experience with us.  This is certainly not the experience we hoped you would have.  Your comments regarding your noted inconveniences have been shared with our management team so that corrective measures are considered and made.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: We always stay at this property. It is close to restaurants, mini marts and has reasonable transportation to Disneyland. It has always met our expectations. The staff is friendly and professional. The beds are comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Great value for the excellent service. They let us check In early with no extra charge. Was very close to Disneyland. The parking was very reasonable compared to everywhere else in the area especially for my truck. Liked it a lot.
Manager Response: Alexis,   We sincerely appreciate your kind words and superb review!  Our guest’s satisfaction is very important to us.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: The staff was very friendly.  I stayed in the king suite, it has a separate living area and I loved it.  We needed to get to the conference and the staff was very knowledgeable about the transportation.  Also, after the conference we needed a ride to Buena Park and they suggested different transportation options.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Rosemary,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.                 Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Noise in the hallway we cant sleep and no body does anything. No towels in our room and no one available until 7 am Nobody fixed our room one night  And to end with the nightmare a cockroachin our room the last night
Manager Response: Rocio,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. The issues you described are truly regrettable and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you. We will be forwarding your feedback to the hotel management team to be reviewed to ensure the issues are addressed. We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.                                                                    Respectfully,                                                                             	 Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: The room was clean, staff was friendly.  For the price it was a good value.  Within walking distance to Disneyland and convention center.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a good deal for the money.  Breakfast was also good.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the kind review! We truly appreciate your words about our staff.  It's definitely a boost for us every time we hear positive reviews such as this.  We look forward to your next visit!    Sincerely,  Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Good- Great location.  Walking distance to Disney.  Nice rooms Staff was friendly  Bad- Ants in room: stayed 1 night had ants in nightstands and bathroom. When brought to attention of staff was kinda like it was a normal thing. Pillows are uncomfortable: mostly because they are too small but also really soft.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We want to take this opportunity to apologize for the pest issues that you experienced.  The safety and comfort of our guests is very important to us.  Your concerns have not been taken lightly.  We are working diligently with our pest management company to combat any problems.  Again, please accept our sincere apology.  We hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to better your opinion.  Sincerely,  Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Very nice hotel.  Free excellent wifi and local telephone service.  Free and very good breakfast.  Very fast service too.  Very clean rooms and free parking.  Available shuttle service to/from Disney Land.
Manager Response: Spencer, Thanks for taking the time to post feedback of your recent stay and your kind words about our fast customer service.  We are glad that you had a good stay and enjoyed our amenities, and our complimentary shuttle service.  We look forward to having you as a guest again in the future.  Sincerely, Bennie	 LQ Customer Care

Summary: Service was great especially the morning valet parking attendant he went above and beyond. Breakfast was good just a little disappointed it was only continental and not like the other La Quintas I've stayed at but besides that no complaints.
Manager Response: Sonia,  Thanks for your review! We truly appreciate your business and hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I don’t recommend this hotel. They way overcharge for their rooms. There was no fan in the bathroom so when your staying with a bunch of people, it can be awkward. There was damage to our bed post. There was stains on the sheets on multiple beds. The maid acted oblivious to it. I don’t think she checked thoroughly. The breakfast is okay. At least they serve it. My bed in the second room was as hard as a rock. I was sore waking up. I also got a really bad bug bite after staying there. Not sure if it was from the hotel or not. I wouldn’t doubt it though. I’m definitely staying somewhere else when going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Melissa,  Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay with us. Please accept our sincerest apologies for your unsatisfactory stay. While negative reviews are disappointing to our team, it provides us with an opportunity to improve. We take great pride in delivering a quality product and superior service and clearly failed to do so for you. The hotel management team will be advised of your review in an effort to improve our operations. We do hope you choose us for your future travels.               Respectfully, Diana – LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Great hotel clus to Disney with two small downsizes that aren't a big deal.
Summary: Stayed here to go to Disneyland. 99 out 100 only for the fact that the payed parking lot is really small and there is no shuttle to Disneyland like other la Quinta's near major tourist spots I've stayed at.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thanks for your review! We truly appreciate your business and hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: My little girls birthday and surprise trip to Disneyland
Summary: We had the best time, it was pretty hot that day we went to Disneyland for the first part of the day. Went back to rest went back to California Adventure...my child had never been there before..the shuttle was convient.
Manager Response: Sharron,   We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and look forward to your next visit!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: I was excited to see the lower price of what looked to be a nice hotel near Disneyland.  Upon arrival, I quickly realized as most things, you get what you pay for.    The rooms were smaller than I had thought they were going to be. We ended up buying another hotel room. Wish we would have just booked a nice room at a nicer hotel instead of two rooms at the mediocre hotel.    Continental breakfast had less options than I had expected.   Only one elevator that took FOREVER to get to whatever floor we wanted to go to (we had a stroller or else we would have opted for the stairs).    The one thing that I will say that exceeded my expectations was the customer service.  The staff was very nice, and during our last day at the park, they let us keep our van parked there and kept our
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are so sorry to hear of the many negative aspects that you experienced during your stay.  Please reach out to our Customer Care team for further assistance at LQCustomerCare@LQReviews.com.  We look forward to hearing from you.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: The hotel is nice for the fact that it's close to the park. The bed I slept in you could feel the springs in, the hallways to the room are ridiculously warm and it takes the rooms a while to cool down. The walls are paper thin, you can hear every conversation in the hallway, we had the room with the extra room and a trundle bed.... the mattress on the trundle bed is basically a crib mattress and no one was going to sleep on it, the sounds might have been limited in there. They charge you $12 a day for parking, and the self parking is limited, so we had to valet everyday, they were fast though so no issues there.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are very sorry to hear of your recent experience with us.  This is certainly not the experience we hoped you would have.  Your comments regarding your noted inconveniences have been shared with our management team so that corrective measures are considered and made.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: They overbook and are really inefficient
Summary: I arrived early morning to the hotel (around 10 am) as expected my room was not ready. So we decided to change clothes leave the hotel and go to disneyland. We spent much of the day at the park, we arrived at 11pm to the hotel and they told us that even as we had reserved 6MONTHS in advance the other person had not assigne me a room and THAT THEY HAD TO CALL EACH PERSON NOT CHECKED IN TO SEE IF THEY COULD GIVE ME A ROOM it took over an hour for them to get the ok TO GIVE ME A ROOM they said they would see if they could give me the night for free thing that didn't happen. THIS WAS MY HONEYMOON ON TOP OF EVERYTHING...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are so sorry to hear of the many negative aspects that you experienced during your stay.  Please reach out to our Customer Care team for further assistance at LQCustomerCare@LQReviews.com.  We look forward to hearing from you.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: All I can say is wow! This location is nothing compared to the other La Quinta inns I’ve stayed at, and I’ve stayed in many all over California. I felt like they take advantage of the people coming to see Disneyland   I will most definitely stay somewhere else next time. Sorry but it was not good.
Manager Response: Steven,   Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.  We are very sorry that you were not fully satisfied with your stay.  We hope to have a second chance in the future to better your opinion.  We appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.   Respectfully,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Good location (just 3/4 mile from park entrance), good breakfast, and good sized rooms.  Hotel does allow pets which is "luck of the draw" in terms of how much barking you are willing to endure during the wee hours of the morning.
Manager Response: Jennifer,   We truly regret that our accommodations did not fully meet your expectations.  We sincerely apologize for the external noise during your stay.  Surely this was quite an inconvenience for you.  Your review will be shared with our management staff so that we can rectify these issues. We hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity in the near future.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Overall a great hotel only complaint was the parking situation wish they had more parking. But other than that clean and quiet which is exactly what you need when you come back to your room exhausted from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Abriash,  Thanks for your review! We truly appreciate your business and hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Overall very happy with stay. I was there with my family and it is very conveniently located close to Disneyland. There is shuttle service but my chose to walk since it's a nice 10 min walk. Lot's of restaurants close by which was nice. Breakfast was good and room was comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the great review.  We take pride in the features mentioned.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This is the only hotel we stay at when we go to Disneyland it’s super close, you can buy your tickets in the lobby, and it’s within walking distance to Disneyland. The staff is helpful and friendly. It’s the best hotel for our family.
Manager Response: Lillian,   We sincerely appreciate your positive feedback!  It is such a delight to hear this positive praise!  Please come see us again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: My daughter rented a room for me so that I could be close to Disneyland for my birthday weekend. Well the room looked great we had a suite two double beds and one sofa bed. Getting ready to rest after long day I slept on the sofa bed, the bed had a major wire sticking out which poked my leg. I immediately went down stairs and reported the problem to the personnel. They said all they could do was have me move rooms, mind you this is almost midnight. I had my 3 year old granddaughter my 65 year old mother and no-one offered to help us move. We finally moved one floor down. The room smelled had no air conditioner. Then we had dogs barking next door, other guest were in the hallway also complaining of the noise. My beautiful weekend turned into a disaster. Awful time will never rent
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are very sorry to hear of your negative experience while staying with us.  We appreciate the constructive critique, as we are continuously striving to improve our guest's experience.  It is only through your feedback that improvements are considered and made.  Our hope is that you will give us a chance to better serve you in the future.  We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: I hope this hotel appreciates it's amazing staff. Juan and Rodondo were amazing with customer service!! My family will stay here again when we visit CA. The pool and jacuzzi were not impressive but room was clean and staff was great. Hotel even provides luggage carrier to haul stuff up to your room.
Manager Response: Marisa,   Thank you for the kind review! We truly appreciate your words about our staff.  It's definitely a boost for us every time we hear positive reviews such as this.  We look forward to your next visit!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Taking advantage of their location to Disneyland
Summary: never staying here again...building is very old ..ceilings no taller then 7 feet high . Their pictures are inaccurate to what you get. Pass this place by! Bedspreads dirty, bathroom toilets so low to the ground. They think by putting a little upscale color can replace poor building maintenance. This place needs a major redo!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Valued,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback of your stay. We are very sorry to hear that several things during your stay did not meet your expectations. The issues you described are truly regrettable. Your comments will be reviewed by our management team so that we may improve our operations. We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.                                                                    Sincerely,                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: close to restaurants walking and driving distance. shuttle is cheap and reliable very friendly drivers. rooms and amenties  in the room are great . employees go beyond customer service. breakfast is very good . times for eating are good . the crew in the breakfast do a very good job I replenishing and keeping the area clean and safe. front desk take good care of customers the small snack are in the front desk area is great so don't have to go far for snacks .
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.   Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I enjoy staying at la quinta locations. This particular one is definitely one of my favorites in orange county. Rooms are huge, staff is great, and location isn't bad at all. Paying an extra $12 for parking is a little ridiculous, but I suppose I get it - people probably always try to park there. $5 would be tolerable. $12 is a bit... meh. That would be my only complaint.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We certainly appreciate the time you've taken to provide your feedback.  It sounds as though your experience was enjoyable overall. Your suggestions for a better stay have been shared with management.   We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Hidden gem for your Disneyland visit
Summary: A great place to overnight while visiting Disneyland.  Adjacent ART shuttle bus stop makes it easy to get to the park.  Also across the street from the mall and many fine eating places.  We have stayed here 6 times and enjoy the suite type rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the top notch review!  We appreciate you taking the time to convey your feedback.  Please come visit us again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Just a room to sleep in
Summary: For the price and location the hotel was average.   Fast check in.   Had to pay for over night parking around $12.00 a night.   Breakfast was average typical La Quinta.   A short Uber ride to Disney at about $6.00 each way..which was cheaper than Disney parking at $20.00.    The worst thing about the hotel was the paper thin floors.   All night till close to midnight our upstairs neighbor was walking back and forth with heavy feet.   Could hear them all night long.    Same thing with our floor but we walked around tippy toe not to let the people below us hear our foot steps.    Would I stay here again...most likely not.     Just so many choices out there.    Not good and not real bad either.    We normally enjoy LaQuintas but this was not one of my favorites.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We truly regret that our accommodations did not fully meet your expectations.  Surely this was quite an inconvenience for you. We hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity in the near future.  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: wonderful place to ,stay. close to disneyland  , the room was very clean and comfortable, the employees were very friendly and nice. we will be back again soon.the breakfast room was super clean and neat and the selection was perfect .
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  When a guest takes the time to write, we are especially grateful.  We are pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay. At La Quinta Inn & Suites, we constantly strive to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed. Thank you for your kind words and we hope to see you back real soon.    Respectfully, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Other than 80' in our room... and no protein really for breakfast, overnight staff that didn't care about a party in the room above us.. or the inroom phone that didn't work.. and being blocked in a parking spot... everything was fine...
Manager Response: Heather,  Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay with us. Please accept our sincerest apologies for your unsatisfactory stay. While negative reviews are disappointing to our team, it provides us with an opportunity to improve. We take great pride in delivering a quality product and superior service and clearly failed to do so for you. The hotel management team will be advised of your review in an effort to improve our operations. We do hope you choose us for your future travels.               Respectfully, Diana – LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel welcomed me and my pit bull mix. They made us feel welcome and comfortable. My dog has cancer and was not feeling well, but he enjoyed his stay. We both did! The rooms were nice and clean too!
Manager Response: Monica,  Thank you for your positive comments. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your business and welcome you and your four-legged family members at La Quinta!  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: La Quinta Hotel and Suites, Anaheim
Summary: Excellent place to stay with family and pets. Rooms comfortable and clean. Frig and microwave.  Covered pool and Jacuzzi. Breakfast area. Nice selection of choices for breakfast. More than just continental.  Walkable to the Gardens and Disney pickup at the corner.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much! We are so happy to hear that you and your family were able to enjoy yourselves at our hotel! Thanks again for letting us know, and we look forward to having you back again!      Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Great place to stay. Friendly staff ready to answer your questions and assist you. Walking distance from the Disney Park at a great price. Super easy check in and check out process makes it easy for late arrivals and tight schedules.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review of our property, your comments are very much valued.   We really appreciate you complementing our customer service.  Our staff members take their roles in our industry very seriously and try, every day to provide that quality customer service that our guests expect.    Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I have stayed at this site over the years.  I was never impressed with the breakfast room.  They now have the muffins in the individual packages.  And yogurt not served in an open bowl.   Now individuals in a mini fridge.  The rooms are clean.  And it's very convenient for Disney.  We walk and it just takes a few min.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  When a guest takes the time to write, we are especially grateful.  We are pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay. At La Quinta Inn & Suites, we constantly strive to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed. Thank you for your kind words and we hope to see you back real soon.    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel was nothing fancy, but offered great options for a family. We got a 2-room suite with a king bed in one room & a trundle behind sliding glass doors in another room. They had several different sleeping options in other rooms, too. The staff was helpful when we had questions or needs (such as towels in the pool area or transportation options to the beach or Angel stadium.) The breakfast was the same thing every day, but it's a value hotel. I was satisfied with the amount of food I got every day. The staff was diligent about keeping food out at all times for guests. Many reviews complained of thin walls & noise. I heard guests in hallways, but it was no worse than any other hotel I've stayed in. That's not the fault of the hotel - it's inconsiderate guests.  The beds
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that we had the opportunity to serve you and we hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.          Sincerely,                                                                                                  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Currently staying for four night but considering moving out. Read the card they leave in the room and expect this type of comical service for your stay. What exactly is your number James Sarkis? There are other issues which I won't say in case I'm identified by staff.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.  We are very sorry that you were not fully satisfied with your stay.  We hope to have a second chance in the future to better your opinion.  We appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.   Respectfully,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Great room for a great price
Summary: I loved how updated the hotel was. It felt modern and pretty. I had a King suite and it was spacious. We thought the value of the stay was worth it and that we actually got a good deal! It is nice to know that the hotel is pet friendly. The next time I'm in town I may bring my little furbaby with!  We were able to check in a little earlier and thank goodness! Hotel is close to Disney. Instead of waiting for the shuttle ($5.50 per adult with all day trips included) we called for a Lyft driver to pick us up. It was faster and cheaper. I recommend that option if you are with a small group. Overall, I would totally stay again and recommend others to stay as well.
Manager Response: Jannela,  Thank you for staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your comments and we wish to welcome you back to the hotel soon!    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Stayed at this Hotel because we were attending a  company party at Angels Stadium. Hotel Staff is  friendly and attentive. Has a like new feel but can tell it was built some time ago due to the parking  structure. If you have a larger vehicle like we did be prepared to park in some tight spots. Once parked we used lyft for our transportation needs and did not have to move our vehicle till it was time to leave. Close to Disney Land and Angels Stadium. Lots of  shops in area of Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback on our property.  We work very hard to deliver a superior level of service and are glad your stay was comfortable. We look forward to seeing you again real soon!   Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Great , affordable DLand area hotel. Great value.
Summary: Park and walk to Disneyland, come back to a comfortable room and look forward to a nice hot breakfast in the morning. Great friendly service. Best value in the neighborhood. Freeway convenient, close to lots of great eating.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your comments and we wish to welcome you back to the hotel soon!    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: The hotel is good, the beds are confortable and  the breakfast very basic, boiled eggs, cereal, and waffles.  However there is a parking fee not happy with that specially when you need the extra bucks for Disneyland!!
Manager Response: Cynthia,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that we had the opportunity to serve you and we hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.          Sincerely,                                                                                                  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: A wonderful hotel! Very friendly and clean place. We also brought our 2 dogs along and didn't have to pay a deposit or any extra fees to bring our pets which we loved! Our room was beautiful and was right near the attractions we went to see. The price was just as well! Nice job we will definitely be back again
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your positive comments. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your business and welcome you and your four-legged family members at La Quinta!  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Our trip to Disneyland was enhanced by staying at this terrific hotel. It's our second stay here, and not only was access to the park very easy, the hotel pool and great breakfast added to the fun of our trip.
Manager Response: Karen,   We appreciate you taking the time to share your fantastic feedback.  It is a pleasure to hear that we had a part in your successful trip!  We hope you will visit us again soon.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Enjoyed our stay! I wish there were more protein options for breakfast besides hard boiled eggs, though. The location was about a 15 minute walk to from Disneyland and DCA and even at night, a lot of people were still walking around the area, so you'd feel safe. Thank you!!!
Manager Response: Dear Patricia,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to having you back again.  Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Great. This was our second visit to this property and it's been good to us so far. Wish they had a more filling breakfast but it's still good. Would most likely stay there again in the future. Disney shuttle picks up outside the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope your next stay is just around the corner!  We look forward to being here for you on your next visit.   Respectfully,                                Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: The family room was the perfect space for our stay. The room had four beds in total and we all fit just fine. The only down side was only having one bathroom for the entire crew to get ready when we got up in the morning. The breakfast was also good.
Manager Response: Esteven,   We appreciate the fantastic feedback and compliments you've given.  Our goal is to provide our guests with a superb experience.  We are pleased to hear that we accomplished that goal!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Valet service was the worst.They left both of our keys inside of one of our cars the first night. We found out because we had left something in there and we went to valet and he couldn't find the keys. Then when we were checking out he gave us the wrong truck keys and then he couldn't find ours then accused us of keeping the wrong keys when we had already gave them back in the first place. He was rude and started to argue with me. Completely dissstafified by the company they chose to do their valet service. They're unorganized and irresponsible, our vehicles could've been easily stolen. Besides the valet, everything else was great, breakfast was awesome and our suite was very spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are happy to learn that overall you were happy with our accommodations and breakfast.  However, we are disappointed to hear of your experience with the valet.  Surely this was quite an inconvenience for you.  We hope to have another chance in the future to provide you with a better experience overall.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Great Value walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We have been bringing groups of students to this hotel for several years to visit Disneyland.  We are able to make reservations months in advance to get the best price.  Very good value with free breakfast and walking distance to Disneyland.  Good high-end restaurants across the street in a mall.
Manager Response: Gary,   We are pleased to hear that you are a loyal La Quinta guest!  We appreciate you choosing our brand year after year for your group's visit to Disneyland.  As always, we appreciate your business and look forward to your next visit!     Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Great place and i trust them. They would do better Need to clean during multiple staying days. Need better breakfast like scrambled eggs other then that was very pleasure personal are cool and nice always says hi to my family
Manager Response: Edel,  Thank you for the candid review.  Your suggestions for a better stay have been shared with management.  We hope you will give us another chance in the future.             Sincerely,  Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Overall I had a great experince at La Quinta. The service was great and very friendly family environment. It is very close to Disneyland which is a plus. The walking distance was great. Also right across the street from the Anaheim Garden Walk which provides many things to do besides Disneyland. I would comeback again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Your review was such a delight to read.  Your comments will be shared with our entire staff.  We look forward to providing you with the same level of top notch service in the future!    Sincerely,  Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This property is very clean, spacious rooms, excellent breakfast choices. Would be better if they had free parking and if the staff woukd have a better attitude.  Near Disneyland and close to freeway access.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your positive feedback on our property. We are always striving to improve our property and genuine feedback is the best way for us to do that. We hope that you will visit us again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Lord. Have. Mercy. I will *never* be staying at a La Quinta again. My friends and I purposely booked this hotel because we had booked a room with 4 beds (2 full size beds + 1 twin + 1 trundle), and we had 4 adult women staying at the hotel. You can imagine our surprise when we checked in and found a crappy sofa bed in lieu of the trundle beds. I called the front desk and they told us that they'd over sold and bumped us from our room, but didn't bother to tell us before checking in. We asked for a rollaway bed, and they told us they apparently don't have rollaways. What kind of hotel doesn't have a rollaway bed?! Fine. Bring us more pillows & towels so we can make SOMETHING work. An hour later they finally brought us everything. The front desk associate offered us free parking.
Manager Response: Ashley M, Thanks for taking the time to share your concerns regarding your stay at our hotel.  I apologize for the inconvenience, and the extra expense, you incurred due to overbooking as this is certainly not the kind of experience we want you to have.  It’s through the constructive comments of our customers that we are able to correct problems that might not otherwise come to our attention, so although disappointing, we appreciate your candid feedback.  I encourage you to contact us at lqCustomerCare@lqreviews.com with your contact information, so that we can discuss the details of your experience at this hotel further.  We look forward to hearing from you to ensure you will stay with us again in the future for a better experience. Sincerely, Bennie

Summary: Stayed here for a week at the end of June, staff were great and helpful. Rooms are neat and tidy and maintained well. Hotel is in a great location within walking distance to Disney and other attractions. Hotel breakfast was basic but filled the gap. Overall a good stay in a nice property.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thanks for brightening our day!  We appreciate the positive feedback and will share your review with our staff.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care
